query.description: Retrieve how many product in a page, default is 10.

request.description: <aside class="notice">Redeem points with reference and amount</aside>

query.description: Show how many record in a page. Leave blank for default (100).

formdata.description: The date of birth to update.

query.description: Show how many record in a page. Leave blank for default (100).
optional The notification ID of notification.
Retrieve how many product in a page, default is 10.
The voucher code to be filter.
The voucher type to be filter
The voucher discount type to be filter
The voucher usage type to be filter

request.description:
Get all voucher that is claimable
voucher discount type
1: percentage
2: fixed amount
3: buy x free y
voucher type
1: public voucher
2: points redeemable
3: register reward
user_voucher (retrieve user's voucher)
1: true
2: false
expired_only (retrieve user's expired voucher)
1: true
2: false
